Dear Mary,
I am sorry for being away from my computer. In my business I am constantly looking for new business opportunities, and I am always looking for help. I am also looking for compensation for my efforts, but I must say that I am somewhat surprised that I am unfamiliar with the process of ghost writing. I would think that most ghostwriters are either hunters or occult investigators. I am quite surprised that I am, either. I do not normally get involved in business transactions, but I am interested in your proposal. I am aware that you have sent me several emails, and I do feel I am progressing.
I am sorely sorry to hear of your loss. You seem like a noble and trustworthy person, and I am assuming that this ghost writing process is similar to the one I am experiencing. I am also sorry to hear that you suffer from 'severe' malaria. I am also assuming that you are also suffering from some form of cancer? 'Sickle' is a disease, perhaps, due to the fact that your mother or father used to have this disease, or perhaps it was your early father?
I am also curious about your religious beliefs. I am Catholic, and am searching to gain more knowledge about the Catholic faith. Do you have any religious beliefs? I would like to know if your faith is strictly 'retrovocal', or if you have any beliefs that I should know about.
Please let me know.

Sincerely,

Xavier
New York, New York
